import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Bell, Search, User, LogOut, Menu } from 'lucide-react'; const Navbar = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const [showUserMenu, setShowUserMenu] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); setShowUserMenu(false); }; return (
{showUserMenu && (
{user?.name}
{user?.email}
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
